overview: NFL Films recounts one of the largest comebacks in NFL history - a moment simply known as 'The Comeback'. In this 1993 NFL playoff game, the Buffalo Bills fought back from a 32-point deficit to defeat the Houston Oilers in overtime, 41-38. Through the use of classic interviews, original radio calls and game footage, this historic moment comes back to life in one exciting program.
title: NFL Greatest Games: The Comeback
